curiosity-auth.maintenanceCopy: We are currently undergoing scheduled maintenance and will be back shortly. Thank you for your patience.

curiosity-banner.dataMismatchMessage: There might be inconsistencies between data in the graph and your current systems table. The issue is currently being resolved.
curiosity-banner.dataMismatchMessage_cloudigradeMismatch: <0>View recommended actions</0> to take in order to improve {{appName}} reporting.

curiosity-graph.cardHeadingDescription_Cores_OpenShift-m: A subscription model that offers purchasing options to match your usage patterns.
curiosity-graph.cardHeadingDescription_Storage-gibibytes: Data storage usage in binary gigabyte hours
curiosity-graph.cardHeadingDescription_Storage-gibibyte-: Data storage usage in binary gigabyte months
curiosity-graph.cardHeadingDescription_Transfer-gibibyte: Data transfer usage in binary gigabytes
curiosity-graph.cardHeadingDescription_OpenShift Contain: A pre-paid subscription model that offers a designated maximum quota of units within a set time frame.
curiosity-graph.cardHeadingDescription_OpenShift-dedicat: A subscription model that offers purchasing options to match your usage patterns.
curiosity-graph.label: {{context}}
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Cores_OpenShift-metrics: OpenShift Container Platform <0>On-Demand</0> core hour usage.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets: {{product}} CPU usage, per CPU socket pair.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_cloud: Public cloud {{product}} CPU usage, per socket. Each instance is considered a single socket.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_hypervisor: {{product}} CPU socket usage, per socket pair.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_hypervisor_RHEL: Hypervisor {{product}} CPU usage, per socket pair, for systems with known host-guest mapping. Each system's socket count is rounded upward to the next even number.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_physical: {{product}} CPU socket usage, per socket pair.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_physical_RHEL: Physical {{product}} CPU usage, per socket pair. Each system's socket count is rounded upward to the next even number.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_virtual: {{product}} CPU socket usage, per socket pair.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_Sockets_virtual_RHEL: Virtual {{product}} CPU usage, per socket. Each virtual machine without host-guest mapping is considered a single socket.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_threshold_Cores_OpenShift: Maximum capacity, as CPU cores, based on total {{product}} Annual subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_threshold_Sockets: Maximum capacity, based on total {{product}} subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_threshold_Sockets_OpenShif: Maximum capacity, as CPU sockets, based on total {{product}} Annual subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.legendTooltip_threshold_Sockets_RHEL: Maximum capacity, as CPU sockets, based on total {{product}} subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.tooltipSummary: Your subscription data facets. With one level of column and row headers.

curiosity-inventory.tab_disabled: The inventory display is currently disabled.
curiosity-inventory.tableSummary: A generated table with one level of column headers.
curiosity-inventory.tableEmptyInventoryMessage: To show more results, clear some or all filters.

curiosity-optin.cardDescription: {{appName}} unlocks a single-pane view into your total subscription package, from usage to capacity, across your hybrid infrastructure over time.
curiosity-optin.cardSeeTitle: Know your account-wide usage at a glance
curiosity-optin.cardSeeDescription: See unified reporting of subscription usage information across your physical, virtual, and cloud infrastructure.
curiosity-optin.cardReportDescription: Enhance your ability to consume, track, report, and reconcile your Red Hat subscriptions.
curiosity-optin.cardFilterDescription: View your inventory by critical indicators like Service Level Agreement (SLA) and architecture.
curiosity-optin.cardIsActiveDescription: Data can take up to 24 hours to be processed and will appear on this page when ready.
curiosity-optin.cardIsErrorDescription: An activation error has occurred. <0>Contact us</0> for more information.
curiosity-optin.notificationsSuccessDescription: It could take up to 24 hours for data to appear.
curiosity-optin.tourTitleImageAlt: Ready to get started example graph.
curiosity-optin.tourDescription: We'll walk you through each step, and include insight into how Red Hat collects and uses subscription data.

curiosity-view.title: {{appName}}
curiosity-view.subtitle: Monitor your usage based on your subscription terms. <0>Learn more about {{appName}} reporting</0>
curiosity-view.description: Monitor your usage based on your subscription terms.
